revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt Mortar |image = [[File:Mt Mortar.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Mt Mortar. |tokens = 5,500 |location = On route 42, east of Ecruteak City. }} '''Mt Mortar''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in an 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 104,100 |- | Tyrogue (Boss) || 360,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Rattata * Zubat * Geodude * Marill * Raticate * Golbat * Graveler * Tyrogue (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} [[Token Collector]] || 33% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
